mn12:2.2: evaṁ → etaṁ (pts1ed, mr) | parisati → parisatiṁ (bj, pts1ed)
mn12:44.2: pavivitto sudaṁ → pavivittassudaṁ (bj, pts1ed) | lūkho sudaṁ → lūkhassudaṁ (bj, pts1ed)
mn12:50.7: sosinno → sosīno (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts1ed, mr); so sino (sya2ed); sosindo (saddanīti)
mn12:57.3: Na kho pana so → na kho paneso (bj, sya-all)
mn12:63.1: Yaṁ kho taṁ → yaṁ kho panetaṁ (bj)
